backend/main.mo: Manages project data in a canister, supporting save, fetch, list, and sorting by last updated time.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for project tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color variables and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app combining header, hero, editor page, footer, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Sticky header displaying app branding and logo.
frontend/src/components/editor/ExportPan: UI panel handling video export flow with progress, download, and error states.
frontend/src/components/editor/ProjectBa: Toolbar for naming, saving, and opening video editing projects using backend storage.
frontend/src/components/editor/Propertie: UI panel for toggling mute and selecting playback speed, updating editor state.
frontend/src/components/editor/TimelineT: Provides play controls, time slider, and trim in/out adjustments synced to editor state.
frontend/src/components/editor/VideoEdit: Main editor layout combining file loading, preview, timeline, export, and properties panels.
frontend/src/components/editor/VideoFile: Handles video file selection, validates type, extracts duration, and triggers load callback.
frontend/src/components/editor/VideoPrev: Video player applying playback settings, enforcing trim range, and syncing time with editor state.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing hero section with marketing text, feature icons, and an illustration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Provides project listing, saving via actor, and helper to open project settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query wrappers to list and fetch individual projects using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoEditorState.t: React hook managing video editor state including file, URL, playback, trim, mute, and speed controls with load and restore helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoExport.ts: Hook handling video export flow, tracking status, progress, errors, and generating a downloadable output URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportTypes.ts: Defines types for export status, settings, and results used in the video export pipeline.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportVideo.ts: Implements video export by rendering frames to a canvas, recording them via MediaRecorder, and producing a WebM blob with optional audio.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and asset needs for the video editor app.
